description: This file defines data models related to responses from a model provider, including classes for handling events, tool executions, and the overall model response structure. It also imports external media, message, and utility modules.

classes.name: ModelResponseEvent
classes.description: Enumeration of events that can be sent by the model provider, such as tool call states and assistant responses.

classes.name: ToolExecution
classes.description: Represents the execution details of a tool, including identifiers, arguments, results, metrics, and state flags.

classes.name: ModelResponse
classes.description: Encapsulates the response from the model provider, including content, media, tool calls, events, and metadata.

classes.name: FileType
classes.description: Enumeration of supported media file types such as MP4, GIF, and MP3.

methods.name: to_dict
methods.description: Serializes a ToolExecution instance into a dictionary, including nested metrics and user input schema.

methods.name: from_dict
methods.description: Creates a ToolExecution instance from a dictionary, parsing nested metrics and user input schema.
